pages.text: Molds are useful within the $(l:blocks/standard_machines#pneumaticcompressor)Pneumatic Compressor,$() as they allow materials to be pressed into refined forms with ease.$(p)In order to get each one, you will need to actually make the Pneumatic Compressor, as they are made within it.
To get the $(8)Gear Mold,$() use a Pure Steel Gear as the mold, and press 2 Pure Steel Ingots to receive it.
To get the $(8)Rod Mold,$() use a Steel Rod as the mold, and press 2 Pure Steel Ingots to receive it.
To get the $(8)Plate Mold,$() use a Pure Steel Plate as the mold, and press 2 Pure Steel Ingots to receive it.
